title: NasNet Library Generator
description: Generate a new library following ADR-003 conventions with proper scope tags and Nx configuration

name.description: The name of the library (kebab-case recommended)
name.x-prompt: What is the name of the library?

directory.description: The directory where the library will be created (e.g., 'libs/features', 'libs/core', 'libs/ui')
directory.x-prompt: Where should the library be created?

scope.description: The scope tag for dependency boundaries (auto-detected from directory if not specified)

description.description: A short description of the library's purpose

dryRun.description: Preview file changes without writing to disk
